ds.board.ds.legend.other: 数据源是数据的实际存储存储位置，由Pydio聚合到全局树种。它们可以根据需要分布到许多存储节点上。

ds.board.enc.legend.other: 主密钥由 Pydio 服务自动生成并存储在服务器保护的密钥链中。 使用下面的工具导出/导入这些密钥，以防您需要在另一服务器上重新安装或部署

ds.board.versioning.legend.other: 您可以定义每个数据源上如何为文件生成版本，以及程序在一段时间内保留多少版本。

ds.board.wsfromds.legend.other: 在数据源 %s 的根中创建一个新的工作区

ds.format-picker.legend.other: DataSources are mount points allowing you to attach actual storage to the application. First select the way data is organized inside storage.

ds.format-picker.flat.legend.other: Best for performances, files are stored as binaries inside the storage. Files and folders structure is kept in internal index only.

ds.format-picker.structured.legend.other: Files and folders are stored as-is, real-time synchronisation reflects storage structure inside internal indexes.

ds.format-picker.internal.legend.other: Used to store internal binaries (e.g. files versions, thumbnails). Limited features, data is not indexed in search engines.

ds.editor.delete.warning.other: 您确定要删除此数据源吗？此操作不可撤销，您可能会丢失所有连接到这些节点的数据！

ds.editor.enc.dialog.disable.other: 如果您以前已经启用了对此数据源的加密，所有加密数据都将不可读！您确定要这样做吗？

ds.editor.enc.dialog.enable.1.other: 在数据源上启用加密将使用您提供的加密密钥开始对存储上的数据进行加密。

ds.editor.enc.dialog.enable.2.other: 请注意，如果您不导出和备份您的主密钥，如果您出于任何原因必须重新安装服务器，

ds.editor.enc.dialog.enable.3.other: 您还必须意识到它可能需要更多的 CPU 才能顺利地实时加密和解密数据。

ds.editor.enc.dialog.enable.create.other: Set an identifier for the new key

ds.editor.enc.key.create.other: Set up encryption with a new key...

ds.editor.legend.delete.1.other: 删除数据源是一个破坏性的操作：虽然它不会删除存储中的实际数据。，但它将摧毁现有的索引并取消链接到此索引节点的所有ACL。

ds.editor.legend.delete.2.other: 请确保在删除之前先删除指向此数据源的所有工作区。

ds.editor.legend.local.other: 文件系统数据源通过对象存储服务器提供服务，将会以S3的存储桶作为父目录。 为此，选定的文件夹必须符合下列要求：

ds.editor.legend.local.li.3.other: 目标文件夹必须符合DNS名称(小写，无空格或特殊字符)。

ds.editor.legend.resync.other: 重新同步将扫描基础存储并检测当前未索引的更改。

ds.editor.legend.s3.1.other: 远程存储数据源将通过远程、兼容 S3 存储的文件服务来代理所有请求而提供文件服务。

ds.editor.legend.s3.2.other: 使用标准的 API Key/ Api Secret进行身份验证，使用官方Amazon S3则将URL留空， 或填写您自己的S3兼容存储的URL。

ds.editor.storage.legend.fs.other: Browse data from a local or network-attached file system.

ds.editor.storage.legend.fs.peer.other: Restricting datasource to a peer address will start the service only a specific node. Using "Any" value will start service on all nodes where Cells is running, which can be handy if a shared filesystem is mounted on all nodes at the same location, or if your node may change its IP on restart. To avoid conflicts, it is better to either use ANY for all datasources or select specific nodes for all datasources.

ds.editor.storage.legend.fs.path.other: Make sure that last folder is lowercase and that its parent is writeable. If your existing folder is uppercase, you can use symbolic links to work around this limitation.

ds.editor.storage.legend.s3.other: 浏览Amazon S3存储库或兼容的 S3 存储库的数据。

ds.editor.storage.legend.azure.other: 浏览Azure Blob 存储桶中的数据。

ds.editor.storage.legend.gcs.other: 浏览来自谷歌云存储桶（GCS）的数据。

ds.editor.storage.legend.versioning.other: 设置版本控制策略来保存文件内容修改历史。请注意它将使用额外的存储空间。

ds.editor.storage.legend.encryption.other: 静态加密可以用来确保文件永远不会以清晰的格式存储在存储器中。如果您不信任存储提供程序，这可能会很有用。

ds.editor.storage.legend.readOnly.other: 如果您不允许程序写入任何隐藏文件并使用ETags作为校验（这对于存储桶中有大量的存在数据来说非常必要），请设置为只读模式。请注意，任何在该数据源中创建的工作区都被设置为只读，文件将无法移动。

ds.editor.storage.legend.flatStorage.other: Flat (unstructured) storage is best for performances. Use structured storage only if you want to make sure to see the files and folders reproduced inside the actual storage (or mapping to a folder with pre-existing data). This CANNOT be changed after datasource creation.

ds.editor.storage.legend.skipResync.other: For huge datasources, you may want to avoid full resynchronisation at restart time.

ds.editor.storage.checksumMapper.other: 本地存储校验(不修改对象)

ds.editor.storage.nativeEtags.other: 使用原生ETags(将禁用桌面同步)

ds.editor.storage.legend.checksumMapper.other: 为了正确的检测文件变更，文件校验码(md5) 由Cells来计算(或者可能的话由储存的副本来计算) 并作为元数据附加到对象上。 处于最佳性能的考虑，使用原生ETags标志来保留存储原始值，但是这将会禁用此数据源上的桌面同步功能。 您还可以通过本地存储元数据，避免在计算校验和时修改对象。

ds.editor.name.inuse.other: 此名称已被使用，请务必选择另一个名称！

ds.editor.selector.completer.hint.other: 从列表中选择，或输入路径并按回车键入确认

ds.editor.selector.error.depth.other: 请确保选择一个二级文件夹。对象存储将从父文件夹开始。

ds.editor.selector.error.dnsname.other: Folder is exposed as an S3 bucket and must comply to DNS names (lowercase, no space or special characters).

ds.editor.selector.folder.hint.other: Select a peer to load folders

ds.editor.selector.peer.any.other: Any peer (unique node or distributed FS)

ds.editor.selector.mkdir.legend.other: 在 %s 下创建一个新文件夹

ds.editor.storage.gcs.credentials.other: Paste content of GCS JSON credentials file

ds.editor.storage.s3.legend.tags.other: Synchronize S3 tags from buckets or objects (use  a comma-separated list of patterns to match). Please note that this will perform additional requests to storage and may slow down sync process. Original tags will be mapped to pydio:s3-bucket-tag-NAME and pydio:s3-object-tag-NAME internally.

ds.editor.storage.s3.bucketPathPrefix.other: Path prefix inside the bucket (used as a folder)

ds.editor.initFlatFromSnapshot.other: If this storage was previously used as a flat datasource, initialize it from an existing snapshot file (must be found inside the storage)

ds.encryption.key.delete.warning.other: 如果该密钥目前用于加密数据，这是一个破坏性的操作！你确定要这样做吗？

ds.encryption.key.export.fail.other: 导出过程中出了点问题

ds.encryption.key.export.password.other: 请提供一个安全性强的密码。

ds.encryption.key.export.result.copy.other: 将结果复制到文件以保存密钥

ds.encryption.key.import.content.other: 从您的备份文件粘贴密钥至此

logs.sys.note.content.other: Empty logs entries may mean that the server is not running in production mode. Make sure to set this log level by passing the --log=production argument or setting the environment variable PYDIO_LOGS_LEVEL=production.

logs.4.other: 单击一行查看详细信息

logs.9.other: 文件将导出为 CSV 格式，带有分号 (;) 分隔符并且字段包含在双引号 (") 中。

menu.10.other: Extensions for sending files through the Web UI

menu.15.other: How users get notifications from various parts of the application.

menu.17.other: Instant messaging and external accelerator tool

menu.23.other: Landing page for user after login. Configure displayed elements and links.

menu.6.other: Options for all files and folders sharing

menu.8.other: Enable/disable editors and manage their parameters

metadata.delete.confirm.other: 您确定要删除此元数据吗？

metadata.editor.ns.error.other: 为这个元数据选择一个命名空间

metadata.editor.ns.exists.other: Name already exists, please pick another one

metadata.editor.tags.cleared.other: 已清除命名空间 %s 的标签

metadata.namespaces.legend.other: 用户可以将元数据附加到任何文件或文件夹。 您可以在此处定义要显示的元数据的类型，以及每个元数据是否可由标准用户（而不是管理员用户）读取/写入。

metadata.toggle.index.other: 是否可被搜索引擎索引

perfs.booster.description.other: Checks that Pydio Booster is started and enables WebSocket communication

perfs.booster.error.other: Pydio Booster Error, see dedicated panel

perfs.booster.help.other: Pydio Booster provides an easy-to-deploy additional tool to add WebSocket support and Upload/Download accelators in Pydio.

perfs.cache.description.other: 检查Pydio是否配置为使用缓存层

perfs.cache.error.other: 您似乎没有启用缓存服务。

perfs.cache.help.other: Pydio 可以连接到外部缓存服务器，如Redis 或 Memcache, 或者使用内存缓存来大大提高文件浏览性能。

perfs.cli.description.other: Defer time-consuming tasks to command line.

perfs.cli.help.other: 启用核心参数中的命令行。这将极大地改善最终用户的性能，因为耗费时间的任务会被委托给其他进程。

perfs.debug.description.other: 检查是否在服务器上禁用调试模式

perfs.debug.error.other: 警告，PYDIO_SERVER_DEBUG, PYDIO_CLIENT_DEBUG 或 PYDIO_SKIP_CACHE 之一已设置为 True!

perfs.debug.help.other: 请确保在服务器上禁用调试模式。此操作是通过手工编辑 conf/booststrap_context.php (或 /etc/pydio/bootstrap_context.php) 文件来完成的。

perfs.desc.other: 检查系统配置以获取可能的改进。

perfs.load.description.other: 检测是否服务器负载过高 (仅对Linux服务器)

perfs.load.error.other: 也许添加一些CPU或RAM 到您的服务器来说很有必要。

perfs.load.help.other: A high server load may indicate that your server is missing CPU or RAM given your usage of Pydio.

perfs.mailer.description.other: Checks that mailer is using the Queue feature

perfs.mailer.error.other: Mailer is not configured to defer emails sending.

perfs.mailer.help.other: Using the mail queue avoids sending every emails directly during every actions and requests, but store them in a separate database and process the queue separately.

perfs.opcache.description.other: Checks that a PHP Opcode cache is active

perfs.opcache.error.other: Could not detect any php extension from APC, APCu, Opcache or XCache.

perfs.opcache.help.other: Pydio is a rich PHP framework that requires loading a lot of files in memory. Make sure to enable a PHP Opcache like APC/u, Opcache or XCache.

plugins.4.other:
Editor plugins are the previewers/editors associated to any file types in the application.
                    These plugins are handle specifically in the GUI (extensions) and can declare the mimetypes they support.
                    The order parameter also allows to define a priority for the 'open with...' action.

policies.policy.delete.confirm.other: 您确定要删除此策略吗？请确保它不会破坏应用程序的安全性！

policies.rule.delete.confirm.other: 您确定要删除此安全规则吗？这可能会破坏应用程序的安全模型！

policies.type.acl.legend.other: These policies are used to dynamically provide read/write access to workspaces or nodes based on the request context and/or the node metadata. They are defined here and used in the Access Control Panel of the users and roles.

policies.type.oidc.legend.other: OpenId Connect Service is used for authentication of the user, before any access to the APIs. As such, you can totally disable the login operation for a set of users based on the requests context, e.g. disable loging from a given set of IP or at a given time.

policies.type.rest.legend.other: These policies are protecting the REST APIs on a per-uri / per-method basis. They grant basic access to some specific APIs for public discovery, and a restriction access to many APIs to make sure they are accessed only by frontend application. You should generally not touch these unless you know exactly what you do.

react.8.other:
You are about to manage permissions at the lower level. This folder will be read
                        only by default, and you will manage permissions selectively on its children. Choose
                        whether to copy the current permissions to its children, or to clear their permissions, which would make
                        them inaccessible by default.

react.9.other:
You are about to disable the permissions management at the sub-level: all
                        children will automatically inherit this folder permissions, and you current settings
                        for these children will be lost. Are you sure to confirm ?

scheduler.1.other: Scheduler is used to trigger tasks automatically on a regular basis. It requires the launch of a master command regularly: if you are using Pydio Booster, it should trigger this for you. Otherwise, use a CRON to launch master command every minute.

scheduler.2.other: Command-line is not enabled in the %1, the scheduler will not be able to run the jobs.

user.17.empty.other: Please provide a label for this group

user.18.empty.other: Please provide a label for this role

user.20.other: User will be created in group %s

user.8.other: Set parameters on this group to apply them all groups and users.

user.moveto.hint.other: Select destination group, leave '/' for root group.

versions.editor.delete.confirm.other: 您确定要删除此策略吗？此操作不可撤销！

versions.editor.error.lastdelete.other: The last period is configured to delete all versions, you cannot add a new one!

virtual.legend.1.other: 模板路径是根据上下文动态计算的。它们可以用作工作空间的根目录来代替固定的数据源路径。 他们被默认用来创建个人文件工作区，指向每个用户不同的文件夹，并计算用户资料库文件夹的位置。

virtual.legend.2.other: 在编辑器中使用Ctrl + Space可获得有关可能值的提示。 支持的当前值为：User.Name（动态解析为当前用户登录的登录名）和DataSources（动态选择数据源）。

virtual.delete.confirm.other: Are you sure you wish to delete this template path? Operation is not reversible!

virtual.card.cleanOnDelete.other: Upon user deletion, rename data to {deleted-NAME-UUID}.

ws.43.other:
Specify here the default access permissions to this workspace folders.
                                To enable the permissions management at a sub-level, select the 'CHILDREN' on a given folder.
                                This will set the current folder as readonly by default, and you will be able to open accesses
                                selectively to any of its children folders.

ws.44.other:
Please be aware that this is only a mask: if you modify the real folders directly, you may have
                                to edit this mask accordingly. Also, these permissions may be globally limited by the 'Default Rights'
                                paremeter set for this workspace (see the General tab).

ws.45.other:
As its parameters are using 'PYDIO_USER' or 'PYDIO_GROUP_*' keywords, the contents of
                                this workspace will vary depending on the currently authenticated user. For this reason, you cannot browse the
                                folders directly and assign permissions to them, but you can freely define some generic pathes that will be used as masks.

ws.48.other: Beware, this workspace/template is not editable, as it is defined directly in the conf/bootstrap_repositories.php file.

ws.51.other:
This workspace has an indexer (%s). Normally, indexation is done "on-the-fly" when files are added/removed
                    through the application interfaces. However if you are doing some modifications directly at the storage level, you may have
                    to manually re-trigger an indexation from time to time. Use buttons below to either index now, or program a task in the scheduler
                    to run indexation on a regular basis.

ws.52.other: Please note: as this worksace has user-specific contents, indexation will be launched for each user.

ws.56.other:
This workspace has a "purge" setup, to automatically remove documents that were left untouched since %s days. Make sure to add a task in the
                    scheduler to regularly process this workspace and look for expired document. You can use the buttons below to create this task automatically,
                    ok run the purge directly.

ws.57.other: Please note: as this worksace has user-specific contents, purge will be running for each user.

ws.61.other:
Activity of the workspace is displayed to the users in the right-hand panel. You can clear all activity
                            for this workspace, which can be handy e.g. if you are going "live" in production after a staging period where you have
                            made some tests in this workspace.

ws.63.other: Warning, this will clear all activity of this workspace displayed to users. Are you sure you want to do that?

ws.72.other: Fill in the form on the right

ws.74.other: Use the form on the right to create a new DataSource.

ws.75.other: A DataSource defines where your data is stored.

ws.76.other: Pydio will aggregate all your datasources into one master tree, on which you can assign rights using workspaces.

ws.complete.label.other: Select a folder or a predefined template path

ws.dashboard.other: 工作区为用户定义了数据的主要访问点。 确保至少定义一个数据源，以便能够创建一个指向该数据源路径的工作空间。

ws.editor.data.legend.other: 工作区向用户显示一个或多个“根目录”：从任意数据源或在运行时自动解析的模板路径中选择一个或多个路径。

ws.editor.default_rights.other: 设置此工作区的默认权限（适用于应用程序的所有内部用户）。 您可以在“人员”中按每个用户/每个角色/每个组的基础上覆盖这些权限。

ws.editor.help.1.other: 工作区允许用户访问您的数据。它们公开了您的数据源中选择的一个或多个文件夹。

ws.editor.help.2.other: 正确地组织数据和如何呈现给用户是很重要的。您可以在每个项目的基础上为您的组织的不同部门(财务、市场、技术数据等) 创建工作区。然后，您可以根据每个用户/每个角色/每个组分配对工作区的访问。

ws.editor.help.delete.other: 警告，危险操作！ 这是不可恢复的。

ws.editor.options.legend.other: 显示给用户的标签和描述。选择一个通俗易懂的名称，以帮助用户更好地管理数据。

ws.editor.other.skiprecycle.legend.other: Disable recycle bin on this workspace: all files will be permanently deleted. This does not apply to Cells created inside this workspace, files will always be moved to workspace recycle to avoid human errors.

ws.editor.other.sync.legend.other: Desktop synchronisation allows users to synchronize their files offline on their computer. Warning, this feature is currently supported for personal files only, as shared workspaces may create conflicts if many users synchronize docs in the same folder. For personal files, you can also enable/disable this feature on a per-role basis using Security Policies.

ws.editor.sync.warning.enable.other: Enabling sync on shared workspaces may have unexpected results if many users are syncing and editing files together. Please note that THIS FEATURE IS CURRENTLY NOT SUPPORTED by our professional services. Please use this feature at your own risk!

ws.editor.sync.warning.disable.other: If people are connected to this workspace, their sync task will not be working any more! Are you sure you want to change that?

ws.editor.other.quota.other: Disk Usage Quota (leave 0 for no limit). This quota is computed on all files of this workspace. For user-specific workspaces (like Personal Files), you can refine this value on a per user/group/role base in the People section.

ws.editor.slug.legend.other: Technical name used for example in URLs, automatically computed but you can customize it.

services.tag.gateway.description.other: World-facing services for accessing the platform

services.tag.datasource.description.other: Storage endpoints used to access concrete file storages. Main services are in charge of starting sub services (per datasource).

services.tag.idm.description.other: All services related to authentication and authorizations, roles, security policies, etc.

services.tag.scheduler.description.other: Services for managing background jobs. The task server can be dispatched across various peers.

services.tag.broker.description.other: Services dispatching and processing events (generally toward users) across the application.

services.tag.frontend.description.other: Web services for user interfaces in the browser

services.tag.discovery.description.other: Basic configurations and services registries called by all other services.

services.service.datasource.objects.lege.other: S3 layer to serve data as object storage

services.service.datasource.legend.other: Datasource is synchronizing data from objects layer to index DB.

scheduler.legend.other: Jobs running in background on a periodical basis or triggered by events

scheduler.system.legend.other: 这些任务是应用程序内默认注册的。 他们通常负责在后台提取节点的某些信息，或进行某些清理操作。

scheduler.inactives.legend.other: These jobs are inactive, click on a job to enable it.

scheduler.users.legend.other: 这些任务是动态创建的并会被用户活动触发。

scheduler.cellsflows.cta.text.other: Do you need to create your own job? Discover how Cells Flows makes it easy to automate your repetitive manual tasks in Cells.

scheduler.cellsflows.dialog.text.other: From creating your own workflows to scheduling tasks or integrating with third-party tools, our customizable components help you to respond events and take action automatically.

scheduler.job.delete.confirm.other: 您确定要删除此作业吗？此操作不能还原！

scheduler.tasks.delete.confirm.other: 您确定要清除此作业的所有任务吗？

developer.rest.apis.legend.other: 以下是Pydio Cell中所有可用的 API。 要使用这些API，您首先必须通过OpenIDConnect 服务的验证才能获得一个有效的JWT。 查看在线管理员指南了解更多信息。

mailer.test.legend.other: 请确保在发送测试邮件之前保存您的配置更改。

sites.details.other:
Sites define how Cells is binding to network interfaces and how it is exposed to the outside world. Use ‘./cells configure sites’ to manage your sites from the command line.

Each site has the following parameters:
  1. 1. Bind(s): one or more [ip/hostname:port] to hook the internal webserver to.
  2. 2. TLS Settings: TLS configuration for HTTPS support.
  3. 3. External URL: the URL you communicate to your end-users. It can differ from your bind address, typically if the app is behind a reverse-proxy or inside a container with ports mapping.
  4. 4. Maintenance Mode [On|Off]: display a maintenance page on this endpoint, although Cells is running.

sites.details.note.other:
Additional notes
  1. 1. When there are no sites defined, Cells use a default configuration (https://0.0.0.0:8080 with self-signed).
  2. 2. Sites can be overridden at runtime by using ‘--bind’ flag or ‘CELLS_BIND’ environment variable.

sites.externals.details.other:
Cells uses its detected public URL in some features. It will try to use the most appropriate value based on your configuration.

For example:
  • • If a unique site is defined and it has an external URL, that one is probably correct.
  • • When multiple sites are defined, you may want to force a unique URL that will be used for all external communication.
  • • If no external URL is detected, it will fallback to the internal bind address. In that case, you probably do not want to send a private IP (or 0.0.0.0:port…) to the outside world.

The fields below show the detected values. Select to edit or type in a custom value and hit enter to save.

sites.mailer.url.other: URL used to build links in emails

sites.links.url.other: URL used to build public links

sites.configs.command.other: Use './cells config sites' command to edit sites.
